original_text: The king then took an oath: “As surely as the Lord lives, who has delivered me out of every trouble,
korean_text: 왕이 이르되 내 생명을 모든 환난에서 구하신 여호와께서 살아 계심을 두고 맹세하노라

sentences.original_text: The king then took an oath:
As surely as the Lord lives,
who has delivered me out of every trouble,
